ol.li: A procedure activity MAY have one or more associated consents, represented in the CCD Header as ClinicalDocument / authorization / consent. (CONF-442)

A procedure activity SHALL contain one or more sources of information, as defined in section 5.2 Source. (CONF-447)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE
